trans-unit.target:
Thank you for expressing interest in this position. We have received your application to the company %companyName%. Your application and submitted CV have been transmitted. Below is a copy of your application
%applicationMessage%:
Our recruiters are currently reviewing it and will contact you to discuss further proceedings or should any questions arise.

Good luck with your application.

Best Regards

Your Matchico Team

Dear %firstName%,

%recruiterFirstName% %recruiterLastName% submitted your application for %position%,

Is this on behalf of you? Please click %confirmationLink% to confirm your application and sign up with Matchico.

Best Regards

Your Matchico Team

Dear %firstName%,

%recruiterFirstName% %recruiterLastName% submitted your application for %position%,

Is this on behalf of you? Please click %confirmationLink% to confirm your application.
